detail_desc: Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
Dress in lightweight, patterned twill with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a press-stud at the sides and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners. Heart-shaped chest pocket, fake front pockets and a back pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a press-stud at the sides and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners. Heart-shaped chest pocket, fake front pockets and a back pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, zipped side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Adjustable metal chain waist belt with a carabiner hook at one end.
Slippers in velour with a reversible-sequin motif on the front and a loop at the back. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
